id: The Ultimate Notion Weekly Twitter Post Matrix
name: The Ultimate Notion Weekly Twitter Post Matrix
description: Want to cut your weekly writing time in HALF?I used this Weekly Twitter Post Matrix to streamline my writing process, and now you can too!With This Template, You Can:✅ Draft Twitter content directly in Notion✅ See your character count✅ See if you've gone over the character limit✅ Organize your content flow for the week✅ Ensure you're varying your content topics✅ Generate a new weekly database in ONE clickDon't Waste Time The OLD Way❌ Writing blindly and going over character counts❌ Jumping betwe
